title: Mark Levin Audio Rewind - 5/21/19
description:
On Tuesday's Mark Levin Show, "Unfreedom of the Press" is officially released! Immediately the Democrats and the liberal media is trying to go after Mark. Also, there was an NPR review that clearly had an agena behind it - they refuse to even remotely understand the Constitution or see another side besides their own agendas. 
Later, the Democrats are using and playing the media to their advantage - by pushing false narratives, especially when it comes to the President and their non stop accusations against him. Finally, Rep Elijah Cummings' wife may have gained 'illegal private benfits.' Cummings should release his private documents just like how the Democrats want Trump to.
